string-array.name: item_descriptions
string-array.item: This one comes from Kerala\'s Syrian Christian aka Suriyani Kitchen. Fresh spices, including coriander, pepper and green cardamom, create a delicious whirl of taste.
This spicy-tangy Goan staple uses Kashmiri chillies, garlic, cumin and peppercorns, with tamarind playing a vital role in bringing out its robust and lively flavour.
Fresh curry leaves join hands with slivers of dried red chilly to create this refreshingly aromatic spicy dish rooted in coastal Kerala.
A spin on the iconic medium-spicy marinade concocted out of a blend of North Indian spices smoothened by fresh yogurt.
This fiery Portuguese sauce brings together pungent bird\'s eye chilles and garlic, pepper, white wine vinegar and olive oil to leave a sizzle you will love instantly.
The richness of freshly ground spices comes together with the pungent spike of green chilly and slightly bitter bite of dried fenugreek.
Inspired by Hyderabad’s iconic biryani, this marinade blends freshly ground garam masala, ginger, garlic and green chilly, tempered with fresh coriander, curd and lemon juice.
Ajwain, with its thyme-like aroma, is the king of this mix, ably complemented by the indulgent flavours of cream and yoghurt.
The classic chill-out companion in the form of a smoky in-house sauce. Remember the outdoors and the grills.
From Alibag’s coastal cuisine, comes this unique, flavourful and rich spice mixture blending more elements too numerous to be mentioned here!
Unique to Jaffna’s Sri Lankan Tamil cuisine for both seafood and meat curries, this spice mix involves blending individually dryroasted ingredients, to create a masala that is replete with flavour.
Aromatic and flavourful spices come together to create the quintessential Chettinad blend that leaves a delicious, lingering taste in your mouth...
This mild tempered marinade melding the pungency of mustard, spikes of green chillies and a hint of cumin reminds you of Kolkata in every bite.
Fragrant herbs, almost straight from the farm, go into flavouring this mild marinade, with a bit of chilly and ginger for that added punch.
Intensely aromatic lemon grass and the oh-so-spicy bird’s eye chilly get together with galangal and kaffir lime in this fresh, fragrant and fabulous offering.
Melt-in-your-mouth morsels concocted out of cream and cheese, uplifted with a hint of chilly and fresh coriander. A refreshing taste of chicken.

string-array.name: promo_desc
string-array.item: Get flat 10% off on total cart
Get 20% off on total cart if number of items is greater than 5
